content: Create your first room template and then you can create new rooms based on it.

comment.text: This translation key describes the content to be displayed when creating a new room template, guiding users through the process of initial room creation based on the template. It appears in the Create Room Dialog component, specifically within an empty screen header and description section.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'أنشئوا' (Anshao) is a command form (second person plural). While grammatically correct, it might be more appropriate to use a more general form like 'أنشئ' (Anshie) which means 'Create' in an impersonal way, especially for a UI instruction.

The phrase "həmin şablon əsasında" (based on that template) is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be "o şablon istifadə etməklə" or "o şablonu istifadə edərək". While technically correct, it doesn't flow as well in Azerbaijani.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: İlk otaq şablonunuzu yaradın və sonra o şablonu istifadə edərək yeni otaqlar yarada bilərsiniz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ມັນ' (man) is used, which while technically correct, might be slightly ambiguous. A more specific term for 'template' might improve clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'ມັນ' with a more specific term for 'template', if a better option exists in Lao context. For example, 'ແມ່ແບບ' could be reiterated or another term used for 'model'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'divisão' is generally used for 'division' or 'section'. 'Room' is better translated as 'quarto' or 'ambiente' in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Crie o seu primeiro modelo de quarto e depois pode criar novos quartos com base nele.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'pode' is grammatically correct, 'você pode' or simply 'você cria' might sound more natural in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Crie o seu primeiro modelo de quarto e depois você pode criar novos quartos com base nele.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Creați-vă primul șablon de sală cu ajutorul căruia puteți crea săli noi' is a bit wordy and doesn't quite capture the concise nature of the English original.  'Cu ajutorul căruia' (with the help of which) is unnecessary and makes the sentence less natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Creați primul șablon de sală și apoi puteți crea săli noi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English uses an imperative, so the Romanian should ideally mirror that. While 'Creați' is correct for the formal 'you', it can feel a little stiff.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Creați primul șablon de sală și apoi puteți crea săli noi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'na osnovu njega' (based on it) is slightly awkward and not the most natural way to express 'based on it' in Serbian. While grammatically correct, it's not as fluent as alternatives.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kreirajte svoj prvi šablon sobe, a zatim možete kreirati nove sobe prema njemu.
